name: Hobo Fight!
description: Hobo Fight! is a party king of the hill game which make Hobos to fight each other in order to win a house in town. The more time you spend inside the house, the closer to claim it as your home. In this crazy game, you and your friends become Hobos and you can do everything that comes with it...like throw things, drink unknown liquids and try a pair of worn out shoes. (The game has been designed for 2-4 players, so go out, get some friends, and bring them back to play!) -- Creators -- Samuel Díaz | Cristian D. Muñoz | Daniel Montes Gil Andrés Camilo Hoyos | Luis Miguel Palacio Simón Sierra | Lucas Herrera
